Text: Synopsis:  Nicki Beck is a wife, mother and courtesy clerk at a major discount chain, living a simple suburban lifestyle with her husband Gary and their 7-year-old daughter Ami, in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. But Nicki's quiet world is rocked when Joanne, a cynical misfit, arrives to declare she's the child Nicki gave up for adoption 20 years earlier. Meanwhile, Nicki's husband attempts to persuade his wife that her low-life brother Roy should be removed from the family tree.
Is this the same Reunited that was filmed in 1998? That's what the synopsis that dahauk posted is for. Or, is this some new show?

Okay, I found out the info. dahauk's info is for a different show.  Here's the info for this show:

"Reunited is a one-off pilot of a brand-new comedy drama from Mike Bullen, the acclaimed writer of Cold Feet and Life Begins. The programme follows the reunion of six people who once shared a house together in London during their early twenties." - http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b00syxlv
